Desarrollador de Aplicaciones para Móviles

Tech Innovation Group

Experimenting and figuring out the wearables behaviour (connection, data transfer, services, characteristics and others) through BLE standard.

Developing in Android ( Java and Kotlin ) using BLE to obtain smartwatch and headband data to diagnose patients and determine the drugs efficacy.

Frontend Developer

OhMyFi

Created and updated user experiences developing the Frontend of clients portals like Starbucks, Alcaldía de Medellín, Movistar Arena, among others.

Technologies used: JavaScript, Jquery, API calls and data usage, CSS, HTML, Git/Gitlab and Scrum.

Monitor

Universidad Tecnológica de Pereira

Por medio del software de las salas presenté atención al cliente a los profesores y estudiantes.

Gracias a este trabajo pude desarrollar habilidades blandas como: Empatía, Orden y calidad, Autocontrol y Construcción de relaciones.
